overview.en: CTB (Caitex Points) is a point system based on blockchain. It is the only point officially issued by Caitex. CTB will support Caitex's global business and a full range of products, such as: VIP fee discounts, certified merchant deposits, Caitex points exclusive activities, transactions with popular currencies, participation in Caitex's business, etc.
overview.zh: CTB（彩童积分）是基于区块链发行和管理的积分系统，为Caitex交易所官方发行的唯一积分。CTB将支持彩童全球业务、全线产品，如：VIP手续费折扣、认证商家保证金、彩童积分专享活动、与热门币种交易、参与彩童业务等。
